long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform how you search and learn with the Perplexity Search Extension ! This Chrome extension allows you to interact with selected text effortlessly. Whether you're researching, studying, or simply curious, you can select any text on a webpage, right-click, and instantly query Perplexity AI with one of these prompts:

📌 What is [selected text]?
📌 Explain [selected text].
📌 How does [selected text] work?

✨ Features:

Quickly select text and search on Perplexity.
Choose from pre-set question formats for precise answers.
Intuitive and lightweight—no setup required!
Option to support the project with a simple "Buy me coffee" button.

🎁 Why Use This Extension?
Save time, learn faster, and get straight to the answers you need without the hassle of manual searches. Perfect for students, professionals, and anyone who loves exploring new concepts!


💡 Support Us:
Love the extension? You can support its development by clicking the "Buy me Coffee" button in the context menu.

Install now and take your browsing experience to the next level! 🚀
